code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import PostData from'../../../data/blog/PostData.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LatestPostOne=props=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`widget widget_latest_post${props.style2==='enable'?'-2':''}  ${props.extraClass||''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"widget-title",children:"Latest Posts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"recent-posts",children:PostData.slice(0,3).map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"single-latest-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"widget-thumb",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"d-block",to:"#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/assets/images/widget/blog/${item.image}`,alt:"Blog Thumb"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"widget-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"d-block",to:"#",children:item.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-calendar-times"}),item.date]})]})]},item.id);})})]})});};export default LatestPostOne;
